content: I was actually inspired to build the F-16 because I had just finished a 1/700 scale USS Arizona battleship model, which took me about two weeks to finish, and I wanted to try something different. I've always been fascinated by fighter jets, and the F-16 is one of my favorite planes. The most challenging part of the build was probably the cockpit, as there were a lot of tiny details to paint and assemble. I used Vallejo acrylic paints, which gave a much smoother finish than my usual Tamiya paints.
